title: Introduction to Tailwind CSS
description: Learn the fundamentals of Tailwind CSS and how it differs from traditional CSS frameworks.
codeExample:
<!-- Traditional CSS -->
<button class="btn btn-blue">Click me</button>

<style>
  .btn {
    padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
    border-radius: 0.25rem;
    font-weight: 500;
  }
  .btn-blue {
    background-color: #3b82f6;
    color: white;
  }
</style>

<!-- Tailwind CSS -->
<button class="px-4 py-2 bg-blue-500 text-white font-medium rounded">Click me</button>
output: Button with blue background and white text, padding, and rounded corners
